sentence.Network_en: Away into the distance stretched ridge after ridge of snow - clad peaks.
sentence.Network_cn: 冰雪复盖的山峰重重叠叠绵延不断地一直伸向远方.

sentence.Network_en: The first snow came a month earlier than usual.
sentence.Network_cn: 第一场雪比往年提早了一个月。

sentence.Network_en: I'd been a fool letting him snow me with his big ideas.
sentence.Network_cn: 我真蠢，居然被他的胡乱吹嘘给蒙蔽了。

美国概况——各州... ... 州府:斜阳 Cheyenne 内华达州的名称是来自西班牙语,其意义为"雪覆盖" Snow-Clad. 州府:哥伦比亚 Columbia.
